name: Hard Helly
description:
How hard can being Helly be? Well, he doesn't have arms, has no special powers, and there are countless monsters roaming around wherever he goes, so I'd say it's pretty hard! But... he can jump, and he can run, so it's all good! Now, all you need to do is take control, and let your skills decide his fate.

Your platforming skills will be put to the test in this traditional 2D side-scroller.

Collect coingems in each level. Your coingem score total will be used to unlock new paths in the world map.

Defeat and avoid all types of dangerous foes. Take 3 hits, and you're done!

Fruit Juice can heal you, but they will get less common and harder to reach the further you get in the game.

The current version is "Alpha Demo 0.1.0", which only has the first 2 levels, so it isn't so hard (...yet).

-Graphics and music were made by me.

-This game was made with the Godot Engine!
